casebody.data:
SUCCESSION OF Craig Michael KRONLAGE. No. 2014-OC-1125. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Sept. 19, 2014.

Prior report: La.App., 2014 WL 1775627.

In re Kronlage, Bridgette Chandler;— Other; Applying For Writ of Certiorari and/or Review, Parish of Orleans, Civil District Court Div. A, No. 2012-09765; to the Court of Appeal, Fourth Circuit, No. 2014-CA-0208.

Denied.

HUGHES, J., would grant.
